title: Mobile Trading Apps See A 300% Increase In Downloads Across ITM Financial's App Line Up Google Play And Apple ITunes
text:
Young forex and binary options signal startup, ITM Financial, has seen a 300% increase in their downloadable trading apps activity in the Google Play store and Apple ITunes store.
Boston, MA (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Mobile trading apps are seeing huge growth in downloads and activity as more and more users are using their phones and tablets to access the Internet. ITM Financial has seen a 300% increase in mobile downloads of their popular US stock market trading app, their forex signals currency trading app, and their binary options signals trading app. The shift comes as laptop and desktop computer sales stagnate, while mobile device sales such as smart phones and tablets continue to rise.
"We are seeing our forex trading app and our binary trading app just getting more and more popular with mobile device users, " says CEO of ITM Financial, Curt Dalton. "Today's trader is looking for faster execution, faster trading platforms, and a mobile friendly experience to their signals or trading apps."
ITM Financial is currently revamping all their mobile trading apps for the US stock market, forex currency market, and binary market to move even faster on trading signals, market updates, and frequency of trading updates. "The mobile app world does not work like the Internet or web pages," says CTO, Ali Khan. "We need to be faster and more aware of how our traders are using our signals and how their current brokers set up is working for them in general on a smart phone or tablet."
"We plan on introducing 3 new mobile trading apps this year to round our library of apps in Google Play and Apple ITunes," added Dalton. "The velocity of which traders are switching to information through apps is just like the rest of the world, just fascinating to see and to be part of as it grows."
ITM Financial currency has 3 trading apps for Android or IOS devices. One app cover US stock market signals, one app covers forex currency trading signals, and one app covers binary options signals .
